channel.title: How to convert main_file_cache.dat2 into just a .dat for other programs
channel.description:
am trying to run a 718 server and i have all these cache collections but none of them are in .dat -- all in .dat2... and all my cache editors need it in .dat... i know i am missing something stupid and right in front of me, but i just cant figure it out!
--thanks in advanced! --Bc1151
